inclusion.criterion: be described in detail and verbal consent will be obtained from those desiring to participate.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eligible subjects must have a diagnosis of Stage III or IV NSCLC or extensive stage SCLC, or Stage IV colon cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: be receiving a chemotherapeutic regimen that requires visits to the Mayo Clinic Department of Medical Oncology < every 4 weeks for the first 6 weeks following enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pathological confirmation is not required if the oncology provider specializing in lung cancer has a high level of certainty regarding the diagnosis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The participants will be required to be fluent in the English language and have intact cognitive status (Folstein mini-mental score > 25).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: paralysis of > 2 limbs (< antigravity strength in all major muscle groups)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic (> 1 year) non-cancer pain either >5/10 or causing the patient to apply for or receive disability payments.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, recent antibx use in the last month on prior admission. Was also txd for Cdiff at that time for 14 d. course with po vanco.
